rules_text: When Dockside Sleuth enters the battlefield, create a Clue token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this: Draw a card.”)[/i]
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
